DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effectiveness safety two different dos temsirolimus ( Torisel ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Of 2 Doses Of Temsirolimus ( Torisel ) In Patients With Mantle Cell Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Have confirm mantle cell lymphoma diagnosis . Have measurable disease . Have receive least 2 prior treatment , may include stem cell transplant . Have adequate organ bone marrow function . There criteriaplease discus doctor . Had prior treatment temsirolimus mTOR inhibitor . Had allogeneic stem cell transplant within last 6 month immunosuppressive therapy . Has active untreated brain central nervous system metastasis . There criteriaplease discus doctor .
